SELECT board_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO board(boardno, memberno, commgrpno, title, bcon, brdate, budate, word, file1, thumb, bsize, bcnt, writer) VALUES(board_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{commgrpno}, #{title}, #{bcon}, sysdate, sysdate, #{word}, #{file1}, #{thumb}, #{bsize}, #{bcnt}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT boardno, memberno, commgrpno, title, bcon, brdate, budate, word, file1, thumb, bsize, bcnt, writer FROM board WHERE commgrpno=#{commgrpno} ORDER BY boardno DESC

SELECT boardno, commgrpno, title, bcon, brdate, budate, word, file1, thumb, bsize, bcnt, writer FROM board
WHERE commgrpno=#{commgrpno}
WHERE commgrpno=#{commgrpno} AND ( title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR bcon LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR word LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' )
ORDER BY boardno DESC

SELECT r.commgrpno as r_commgrpno, r.name as r_name, c.boardno, c.commgrpno, c.title, c.bcon, c.brdate, c.budate, c.word, c.file1, c.thumb, c.bsize, c.bcnt, c.writer FROM commgrp r, board c WHERE r.commgrpno = c.commgrpno ORDER BY boardno DESC

SELECT r.commgrpno as r_commgrpno, r.name as r_name, c.boardno, c.commgrpno, c.title, c.bcon, c.brdate, c.budate, c.word, c.file1, c.thumb, c.bsize, c.bcnt, c.writer FROM commgrp r, board c WHERE r.commgrpno = r.commgrpno AND r.commgrpno = c.commgrpno ORDER BY c.boardno DESC
